name: Roronoa Zoro
message: If I can’t even protect my captain’s dream, then whatever ambition I have is nothing but talk! Luffy must be the man who becomes the Pirate King

name: General Franky
message: The government says your existence is a crime, but no matter what kind of weapons you may hold, just being alive isn’t a sin! There’s no crime in living!

name: Monkey D. Luffy
message: I don’t want to conquer anything. I just think the guy with the most freedom in this whole ocean… is the Pirate King!

name: Da Chop
message: I don’t care now. I wanted to look like a human because I wanted friends. Now I want to be a monster who’s helpful to Luffy!

name: Usopp
message: There comes a time when a man has to stand and fight! That time is when his friends’ dreams are being laughed at! And I won’t let you laugh at that!

name: Nami
message: Life is like a pencil that will surely run out, but will leave the beautiful writing of life

name: Nico Robin
message: Sometimes the only thing you have to doubt is your own common sense

name: Brook
message: What do you know of death?!! Have you ever died?!! You think death will preserve your cause forever?!! Ridiculous!! Death leaves nothing behind!!

name: Sanji
message: Any person who hurts Nami-san’s feelings! I won’t let them live peacefully!
